steps.name: POST: Add new pet to the store (Request URL: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet, body: {"id": 5, "category": {"id": 2, "name": "Aaron Brown"}, "name": "Miss Stacy Conner", "photoUrls": ["https://placekitten.com/494/300"], "tags": [{"id": 31, "name": "material"}], "status": "available"}
Assert that response status code is 200

POST: Update an existing pet (Request URL: https://petstore.swagger.io/v2/pet, body: {"id": 9702021, "category": {"id": 48153811, "name": "Vickie Gallegos"}, "name": "Mary Richards", "photoUrls": ["https://placekitten.com/310/900"], "tags": [{"id": 70681, "name": "design"}], "status": "pending"}
Assert that response status code is 200

Validate json schema. Schema: {'$defs': {'Category': {'properties': {'id': {'title': 'Id', 'type': 'integer'}, 'name': {'title': 'Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['id', 'name'], 'title': 'Category', 'type': 'object'}, 'Tag': {'properties': {'id': {'title': 'Id', 'type': 'integer'}, 'name': {'title': 'Name', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['id', 'name'], 'title': 'Tag', 'type': 'object'}}, 'additionalProperties': False, 'properties': {'id': {'title': 'Id', 'type': 'integer'}, 'category': {'anyOf': [{'$ref': '#/$defs/Category'}, {'type': 'null'}], 'default': None}, 'name': {'anyOf': [{'type': 'string'}, {'type': 'null'}], 'default': None, 'title': 'Name'}, 'photoUrls': {'items': {'type': 'string'}, 'title': 'Photourls', 'type': 'array'}, 'tags': {'items': {'$ref': '#/$defs/Tag'}, 'title': 'Tags', 'type': 'array'}, 'status': {'anyOf': [{'type': 'string'}, {'type': 'null'}], 'default': None, 'title': 'Status'}}, 'required': ['id', 'photoUrls', 'tags'], 'title': 'Pet', 'type': 'object'}. Json: {'id': 9702021, 'category': {'id': 48153811, 'name': 'Vickie Gallegos'}, 'name': 'Mary Richards', 'photoUrls': ['https://placekitten.com/310/900'], 'tags': [{'id': 70681, 'name': 'design'}], 'status': 'pending'}

Validate fields. Actual: {'id': 9702021, 'category': {'id': 48153811, 'name': 'Vickie Gallegos'}, 'name': 'Mary Richards', 'photoUrls': ['https://placekitten.com/310/900'], 'tags': [{'id': 70681, 'name': 'design'}], 'status': 'pending'}, Expected: {'id': 9702021, 'category': {'id': 48153811, 'name': 'Vickie Gallegos'}, 'name': 'Mary Richards', 'photoUrls': ['https://placekitten.com/310/900'], 'tags': [{'id': 70681, 'name': 'design'}], 'status': 'pending'}
